thread.title: Future Recruits A-1 Shooters in His New Video for "Draco"
thread.title_full: Future Recruits A-1 Shooters in His New Video for "Draco"

author: Edwin Ortiz
title: Future Recruits A-1 Shooters in His New Video for "Draco"
text: Video via YouTube Future 's run continues as the Atlanta rapper drops his new video for "Draco." It features him recruiting a handful of women to carry out some deadly deeds in an effort to stack as much paper as possible. And they definitely get the job done. Image via YouTube Image via YouTube Image via YouTube The video for "Draco" is the latest highlight from Future's self-titled album , which came out last Friday (Feb. 17). Unless you live under a rock, Future just announced a new album, fittingly titled HNDRXX , which is set to drop this Friday (Feb. 24). It's an unprecedented move, and will likely result in back-to-back No. 1 albums for Future as his self-titled release is currently on pace to move 150,000 units in its first week according to Billboard .
